title: Bug 8566Column widths in Editor chooser not remembered
description: Bug 8566Column widths in Editor chooser not remembered
OB: In the Editor chooser (WindowSwitch to Editor), in the table of editors,changes to the column widths are not remembered for the next time you open thechooser.
SR: In the Editor chooser (WindowSwitch to Editor), in the table of editors,changes to the column widths are not remembered for the next time you open thechooser.
